This. What’s correct and what is truncation error is a matter of how you choose to define things. As you say, if by `sin` you really mean `a polynomial that just _happens_ to closely approximate sin`, then you’re fine.

This is a more general thing as well — what is considered to be the correct cotangent w.r.t. e.g. a `Diagonal` matrix really depends on how you choose the define things.
